page.title: 03 Colin's Day
page.content: My alarm clock wakes me up at quarter to eight.I wash my face, brush my teeth, dress, have some cereal for breakfast,and travel to school. When we get to school I wait for my friend Dean to come. We talk until the whistle goes and chatter all the way up the stairs. The teacher calls the register, some people go to computer while we do some maths. Often the teacher reads the next chapter of our story. After a playtime of fifteen minutes, we do english. The entire school assembles in the hall for the Thursday Show - news,acts and quizzes. At twelve o'clock pupils go home, stay for school dinners or eat sandwiches. We have an "art afternoon" painting, drawing & colouring. There is another fifteen minutes break. After the last lesson we go home.{
